entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
